responses: Hi there, how can I help?

responses: It is located at Dillibazar Height, Kathmandu.
It is in Dillibazar Height, Kathmandu
It starts from 11:15 am in the morining for the Day Shift and 6:30 am for morning shift(7th & 8th Semester)

patterns: what is the chance of getting scholarship?
responses: Students securing highest marks in semester exams is awarded with semester scholarship whereas there is no entrance based scholarship available in college

patterns: what is the phone number of college?
what is the contact number of college
what is the procedure for admission
what are the documents for admission
responses: Students who have passed the entrance exam conducted by the Institute of Science and Technology (IoST), T.U., can only apply for admission at Trinity International College. Students are selected strictly on a merit basis from amongst the applicants.To be eligible to appear in the IoST entrance exam, one must have secured a minimum of 45 % marks in +2 Science or A Level or Diploma in Engineering or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics. One who has appeared in the final examination of +2 Science or equivalent can also apply.

responses: Training & placement unit, well equipped Laboratories,Regular field visits,Students counselling,Research & development unit,Library,Internet connectivity,Sports

responses: Yes, we provide different training programs as per the requirement of students
